title: 80 Jonathan Lundgren - Regen ag much more profitable than extractive ag?!

summary:
A conversation with Dr. Jonathan Lundgren, director of the nonprofit Regenerative Agriculture Research Center, the ECDYSIS Foundation, and the CEO of Blue Dasher farm in South Dakota.

Dr. Lundgren, ex USDA scientist turner farmer, proved the profitability of regenerative grain farms and he is now working on almonds and livestock. 

  • What is the role of science and scientists in the regenerative agriculture revolution? 
  • Why are there so few peer-reviewed papers on regen ag? 
  • Why does it seem like advanced regenerative farmers are doing things which are absolutely impossible according to traditional academia? 


With Jonathan Lundgren we spoke about impacts on soil, farmers, future of food production and scientific community.
